name: No Escape Room
description:
This is the first chapter, where I begin to develop the game. You can play to the zero chapter or the first chapter to begin, it's the same.
In this game, you control a guy who doesn't remember why he's there and you find a child who, for now, you can't save... but there will be more finals.

Games features:

You can change the resolution, quality and if you want fullscreen or not!; Now, you can read (many) dialogue slowly, pressing enter to go ahead; Added new pointer cursor!
